data.message: Christmas has come early this year as we’ve teamed up with Louisa Johnson and Capital FM to give you the chance to win 1 of 20 pairs of tickets to Capital’s Jingle Bell Ball! All you have to do to enter, is tell us which night you'd like to attend in the comments below :) T&C’s apply (GB residents only, 16+, promotion open from 9/11/17-20/11/17): www.cocacola.co.uk/legal/JBB-promotion #holidaysarecoming #CapitalJBB
